org.drombler.acp.core.action.spi

Interface ToolBarContainer<T,B>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the GUI-toolkit specific type of a tool bar
    B - the GUI-toolkit specific base type of a tool bar button.

    public interface ToolBarContainer<T,B>
    A GUI-toolkit agnostic service provider interface for tool bar container. A tool bar container can contain multiple tool bars each identified by an unique id. The tool bars can be visible or hidden.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Adds a tool bar container listener only for the specified tool bar id.

      Adds a tool bar container listener.

      Indicates if this container contains a tool bar with the specified id

      Indicates if the tool bar with the specified id is visible

      Removes a tool bar container listener only for the specified tool bar id.

      Removes a tool bar container listener.

                PositionableAdapter<T> toolBar)
        Adds a tool bar to this container.
        Parameters:
        toolBarId - the id of the tool bar
        toolBar - the tool bar with the preferred position

      • removeToolBar

        PositionableAdapter<T> removeToolBar(String toolBarId)
        Removes the tool bar with the specified id from this container.
        Parameters:
        toolBarId - the tool bar id
        Returns:
        the removed toolBar or null if not found

      • addToolBarButton

        void addToolBarButton(String toolBarId,
                      PositionableAdapter<? extends B> toolBarButton)
        Adds a tool bar button to the tool bar with the specified id.
        Parameters:
        toolBarId - the id of the tool bar the provided button should be added to
        toolBarButton - tbe tool bar button with the preferred position

      • removeToolBarButton

                                                     B toolBarButton)
        Removes a tool bar button from the tool bar with the specified id.
        Parameters:
        toolBarId - the id of the tool bar the provided button should be removed from
        toolBarButton - tbe tool bar button
        Returns:
        the removed tool bar button or null if not found

      • containsToolBar

        boolean containsToolBar(String toolBarId)
        Indicates if this container contains a tool bar with the specified id
        Parameters:
        toolBarId - the tool bar id
        Returns:
        true, if this container contains a tool bar with the specified id, else false
